description:
They want to inject everyone with their mercury, monkey, pig, plant DNA, aborted baby cells poison that genetically changes you and weakens you - but for now, the plan is, to THRUST Gates to purposely look and sound outrageous with this vaccination/human tagging plan. 
KNOWING that the majority of people at this point will reflexively resist it; """"they"""" do this so that when someone else on the â€˜teamâ€™ speaks up as, """"the voice of reason"""" and proposes something a little more palatable to the masses of sheeple.
Vaccinating  everyone against their will as a prerequisite to reopening the country and the relaxing of the house arrest restrictions, is a little too much; so what 'we' propose is that all you have to do to go back to normal is to simply go GET TESTED and receive a certificate that clears you as a threat to anyone.
Once  everyone does this much more simple and reasonable solution to the problem, then we can go back to normal... And the masses of sheeple with a feeling of victory over the evil Bill Gates will rise-up and say, """"Yeah!! we have no problem getting tested so we can all go back to normal, but we won't take that Gates vaccination & tracking plan.... And all the  Masked Zombies rush down and receive their mandatory test, WHICH IS WHAT THEY WANTED YOU TO DO IN THE FIRST PLACE!- and this is the part where THEY INFECT YOU WITH SOMETHING. 
THINK!!!, had they led with the """"more reasonable"""" solution, IT would have been considered the """"EVIL"""" to be avoided, so they send Gates out to be the extreme!
Be not deceived..."""" Not only do they want EVERYONE'S DNA & Matching Contact Info in their government databases, this also now sets the impetus for their NEXT STEP, when a whole bunch of tested people test positive, even though they don't feel sick, are then required to report to the nearest FEMA location for """"further testing"""", and unknowingly, to be quarantined. ðŸ‘‰ READ THE REST IN THE COMMENT SECTION ðŸ‘‡
